${ModID}:Poggers.NAME: PoggyWoggy
${ModID}:Poggers.DESCRIPTION: Does some pog shit if it existed.

${ModID}:Granted.NAME: Wish Granted
${ModID}:Granted.DESCRIPTION: *Wish for the PERFECT Upgraded Rare card to add to your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Granted.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL *Wish for the PERFECT Upgraded Rare card to add to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:DijinnWrath.NAME: Dijinn's Wrath
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: deals its intended damage to you.

${ModID}:Prick.NAME: Prick
${ModID}:Prick.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL If this card is Exhausted, ALL characters lose !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:AvertYourGaze.NAME: Avert Your Gaze
${ModID}:AvertYourGaze.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL You do not gain *Petrification from dealing damage or applying debuffs this turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Chilled.NAME: Chilled
${ModID}:Chilled.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL Whenever this card is drawn, lose [E] , then draw !M! card.

${ModID}:QueensGrace.NAME: Queen's Grace
${ModID}:QueensGrace.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:QueensGrace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:RooksCharge.NAME: Rook's Charge
${ModID}:RooksCharge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for each other Attack in your hand.

${ModID}:BishopsPrayer.NAME: Bishop's Prayer
${ModID}:BishopsPrayer.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card. NL Shuffle this card back into your draw pile.

${ModID}:PawnsAdvance.NAME: Pawn's Advance
${ModID}:PawnsAdvance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL This turn, all Pawn's Advances gain !M! bonus damage and Block.

${ModID}:KingsCommand.NAME: King's Command
${ModID}:KingsCommand.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you play another card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${ModID}:KnightsManeuver.NAME: Knight's Maneuver
${ModID}:KnightsManeuver.DESCRIPTION: Choose: Gain !M! Dexterity and lose 1 Strength, or gain !M! Strength and lose 1 Dexterity.

${ModID}:CursedTapestry.NAME: Cursed Tapestry
${ModID}:CursedTapestry.DESCRIPTION: Fleeting. NL Lose !M! HP. NL Deal !D! Damage. NL Gain a random Common Relic.

${ModID}:Greedy.NAME: Greedy
${ModID}:Greedy.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Ethereal. NL When drawn, lose !M! Gold.

${ModID}:DarkEnchantment.NAME: Dark Enchantment
${ModID}:DarkEnchantment.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Increase all numbers that can be increased on cards in hand by 1 this combat. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:WindStrike.NAME: Wind Strike
${ModID}:WindStrike.DESCRIPTION: *Choose *One - Deal !D! damage Gain !B! Block or shuffle a copy of this into your draw pile. NL Each *Wind *Strike increases the damage and block gain by !M!

${ModID}:Stormfront.NAME: Stormfront
${ModID}:Stormfront.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Wind *Strike into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Knowledge.NAME: Wish for Knowledge
${ModID}:Knowledge.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. NL Autoplay. NL Add a copy of a random card that you only have 1 copy of in your deck to it.

${ModID}:SlimeElixir.NAME: Slime Elixir
${ModID}:SlimeElixir.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Shuffle a *Slimed into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
